name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki FC Kai - HD Edition
storyline: In the kingdom of Liberl, a man named Cassius Bright serves as one of the land's greatest Bracers, a freelance organization dedicated to keeping peace and helping those in need. When he is called off to business in the neighboring country, his daughter Estelle and his adopted son Joshua take on his work as upcoming Bracers. But when the airship he was traveling on vanishes, his children seize the task of discovering the truth behind the incident, and rescuing their father.
summary: A remaster of the PSP version of the first installment in the series, serving as the beginning to the Liberl arc and the series as a whole, with enhanced graphics, cross-save with the PSP version and extras like PS3 themes, music, calendars and more. The game follows protagonists Estelle Bright and her adopted brother Joshua, who journey through the country of Liberl to train to become senior Bracers, members of a non-government multinational organization that acts to keep the peace and protect civilians.
